languages.text: {n}Мигая вид-скрином, когитатор стойко несет вахту у входа в заставу. В нем зияет разъем, подходящий по размеру для стержня, выданного офицером Кляйном.{/n}
{n}Its screen flickering, the cogitator dutifully keeps watch at the entrance to the post. There is a slot matching the rod given to you by Captain Klein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Мигая вид-скрином, когитатор стойко несет вахту у входа в заставу. В нем зияет разъем, подходящий по размеру для стержня, выданного офицером Кляйном.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Blinking its screen, the cogitator dutifully keeps watch at the entrance to the post. There is a slot matching the rod given to you by Officer Klein.{/n}
{n}Blinking its screen, the cogitator dutifully keeps watch at the entrance to the post. There is a slot matching the rod given to you by Officer Klein.{/n}
{n}Its screen flickering, the cogitator dutifully keeps watch at the entrance to the post. There is a slot matching the rod given to you by Officer Klein.{/n}

{n}Its screen flickering, the cogitator dutifully keeps watch at the entrance to the post. There is a slot matching the rod given to you by Captain Klein.{/n}
{n}Its screen flickering, the cogitator dutifully keeps watch at the entrance to the post. There is a slot matching the rod given to you by Captain Klein.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El cogitador vigila incansable la entrada al puesto con su pantalla titilante. Tiene una ranura en la que encaja la varilla que te entregó el capitán Klein.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Its screen flickering, the cogitator dutifully keeps watch at the entrance to the post. There is a slot matching the rod given to you by Captain Klein.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El cogitador vigila incansable la entrada al puesto con su pantalla titilante. Tiene una ranura en la que encaja la varilla que te entregó el capitán Klein.{/n}

languages.text: {n}画面をチカチカさせながら、考算機は駐屯地の入り口を絶えず見張っている。クライン中隊長から渡されたロッドと同じスロットがあった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Its screen flickering, the cogitator dutifully keeps watch at the entrance to the post. There is a slot matching the rod given to you by Captain Klein.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}画面をチカチカさせながら、考算機は駐屯地の入り口を絶えず見張っている。クライン中隊長から渡されたロッドと同じスロットがあった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}沉思者尽职地守护着哨所的入口。它的屏幕不断闪烁，屏幕下方的凹槽与克莱因上尉给你的数据棒相匹配。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Its screen flickering, the cogitator dutifully keeps watch at the entrance to the post. There is a slot matching the rod given to you by Captain Klein.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}沉思者尽职地守护着哨所的入口。它的屏幕不断闪烁，屏幕下方的凹槽与克莱因上尉给你的数据棒相匹配。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mit flackerndem Bildschirm hält der Cogitator pflichtbewusst am Eingang zu dem Posten Wache. Es gibt einen Steckplatz, der zu der Stange von Captain Klein passt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Its screen flickering, the cogitator dutifully keeps watch at the entrance to the post. There is a slot matching the rod given to you by Captain Klein.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit flackerndem Bildschirm hält der Cogitator pflichtbewusst am Eingang zu dem Posten Wache. Es gibt einen Steckplatz, der zu der Stange von Captain Klein passt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le cogitateur veille consciencieusement à l'entrée du poste. Vous remarquez une fente correspondant à la tige de contrôle que le capitaine Klein vous a remise.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Its screen flickering, the cogitator dutifully keeps watch at the entrance to the post. There is a slot matching the rod given to you by Captain Klein.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le cogitateur veille consciencieusement à l'entrée du poste. Vous remarquez une fente correspondant à la tige de contrôle que le capitaine Klein vous a remise.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ekranı titreşen kavramsayar, mahal girişinde nöbet tutuyor. Komutan Klein'ın verdiği çubuğa uyan bir bölme var.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Its screen flickering, the cogitator dutifully keeps watch at the entrance to the post. There is a slot matching the rod given to you by Captain Klein.{/n}
